message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, though. I can sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet at $95?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell it to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Can we meet at $100?

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to give in just yet. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell it to you for $102. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
